findings.title: Contract Owner can transfer funds without limit to the team wallet
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to transfer funds without limit to the team wallet, which may volatile the tokenâ€™s price.

findings.title: The swap address is assigned once in the constructor and it cannot be changed
findings.description: A contract that cannot change the swap address may not be able to catch-up the upgrade.

findings.title: The functions _tokenTransfer and _tranferStandard can be merged to perform less operation on token transfers
findings.description: There are code segments that could be optimized.
